detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the arcs
arc
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the arc
arc
pointer to a arc object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a arc object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new arc
copy
pointer to a arc object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created arc

Set the start and end angles of an arc. 0 deg: bottom, 90 deg: right etc.
arc
pointer to an arc object
start
the start angle [0..360]
end
the end angle [0..360]

Set a style of a arc.
arc
pointer to arc object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the start angle of an arc.
arc
pointer to an arc object
the start angle [0..360]

Get the end angle of an arc.
arc
pointer to an arc object
the end angle [0..360]

Get style of a arc.
arc
pointer to arc object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to the style
